original_text: For the sins of her prophets, and the iniquities of her priests, that have shed the blood of the just in the midst of her,
korean_text: 그의 선지자들의 죄들과 제사장들의 죄악들 때문이니 그들이 성읍 안에서 의인들의 피를 흘렸도다

sentences.original_text: For the sins of her prophets,
and the iniquities of her priests,
that have shed the blood of the just
